name.description: The name or title of the NFT

description.description: A detailed description of the NFT

owner.description: The wallet address of the owner of the NFT

imageUrl.description: The URL of the NFT's image

name.description: The name or title of the collection

timestamp.description: Timestamp of the checkpoint - number of milliseconds from the Unix epoch Checkpoint timestamps are monotonic, but not strongly monotonic - subsequent checkpoints can have same timestamp if they originate from the same underlining consensus commit

networkTotalTransactions.description: Total number of transactions committed since genesis, including those in this checkpoint.

epochRollingGasCostSummary.description: The running total gas costs of all transactions included in the current epoch so far until this checkpoint.

name.description: The name or title of the coin
